title: Multiple versions of Dockerfiles fail to build
body_html:
PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines

  • OS: Mac
  • PyTorch version: master, v0.3.1, v0.3.0, v0.2.0, v0.1.12
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):
  • Python version: N/A
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
  • GPU models and configuration: N/A
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): N/A

Version 0.3.1 below:

docker build --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=XXXX --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=XXXX --build-arg http_proxy=XXXX --build-arg https_proxy=XXXX -t test:XXXXX https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git#v0.3.1

This produces this:

WARNING: The following packages cannot be authenticated!
  libnccl2 libnccl-dev
E: There were unauthenticated packages and -y was used without --allow-unauthenticated
The command '/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends          build-essential          cmake          git          curl          vim          ca-certificates          libnccl2=2.0.5-2+cuda8.0          libnccl-dev=2.0.5-2+cuda8.0          libjpeg-dev          libpng-dev &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*' returned a non-zero code: 100

UPDATE:
Same goes for v0.3.0

UPDATE:
Running v0.2.0 fails with below

 CMakeFiles/THC.dir/build.make:217: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorMode.cu.o' failed
    make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorMode.cu.o] Error 1
    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
    CMakeFiles/Makefile2:67: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/THC.dir/all' failed
    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/THC.dir/all] Error 2
    Makefile:127: recipe for target 'all' failed
    make: *** [all] Error 2
    Running setup.py install for torch: finished with status 'error'
Cleaning up...
  Removing source in /tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build
Command "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/bin/python -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-k2bx1enk-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/
Exception information:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 215, in main
    status = self.run(options, args)
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/commands/install.py", line 342, in run
    prefix=options.prefix_path,
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/req/req_set.py", line 784, in install
    **kwargs
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 878, in install
    spinner=spinner,
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/utils/__init__.py", line 707, in call_subprocess
    % (command_desc, proc.returncode, cwd))
pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/bin/python -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-k2bx1enk-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/
Looking up "https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip/json" in the cache
No cache entry available
Starting new HTTPS connection (1): pypi.python.org
"GET /pypi/pip/json HTTP/1.1" 200 72983
Updating cache with response from "https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip/json"
Caching b/c date exists and max-age > 0
The command '/bin/sh -c TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="3.5 5.2 6.0 6.1+PTX" TORCH_NVCC_FLAGS="-Xfatbin -compress-all"     CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../"     pip install -v .' returned a non-zero code: 1

UPDATE:
Running 0.1.12 gives this, similar to latest versions but different package:

WARNING: The following packages cannot be authenticated!
  libcudnn6 libcudnn6-dev
E: There were unauthenticated packages and -y was used without --allow-unauthenticated
The command '/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends          build-essential          cmake          git          curl          ca-certificates          libjpeg-dev          libpng-dev          libcudnn6=$CUDNN_VERSION-1+cuda8.0          libcudnn6-dev=$CUDNN_VERSION-1+cuda8.0 &&      rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*' returned a non-zero code: 100

UPDATE:
Running master gives this:

[ 19%] Building NVCC (Device) object src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorMode.cu.o
    Killed
    CMake Error at ATen_generated_THCTensorIndex.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
      Error generating file
      /tmp/pip-fbuuiu10-build/torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/./ATen_generated_THCTensorIndex.cu.o


    src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:154: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorIndex.cu.o' failed
    make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/__/THC/ATen_generated_THCTensorIndex.cu.o] Error 1
    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
    CMakeFiles/Makefile2:233: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
    make[1]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
    Makefile:127: recipe for target 'all' failed
    make: *** [all] Error 2
    Running setup.py install for torch: finished with status 'error'
Cleaning up...
  Removing source in /tmp/pip-fbuuiu10-build
Command "/opt/conda/bin/python -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-fbuuiu10-build/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-giq0q4m5-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-fbuuiu10-build/
Exception information:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 215, in main
    status = self.run(options, args)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/commands/install.py", line 342, in run
    prefix=options.prefix_path,
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/req/req_set.py", line 784, in install
    **kwargs
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 878, in install
    spinner=spinner,
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/utils/__init__.py", line 707, in call_subprocess
    % (command_desc, proc.returncode, cwd))
pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "/opt/conda/bin/python -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-fbuuiu10-build/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-giq0q4m5-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-fbuuiu10-build/
Looking up "https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip/json" in the cache
No cache entry available
Starting new HTTPS connection (1): pypi.python.org
"GET /pypi/pip/json HTTP/1.1" 200 72983
Updating cache with response from "https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip/json"
Caching b/c date exists and max-age > 0
The command '/bin/sh -c TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="3.5 5.2 6.0 6.1 7.0+PTX" TORCH_NVCC_FLAGS="-Xfatbin -compress-all"     CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../"     pip install -v .' returned a non-zero code: 1

PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines

OS: Mac

body:
PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines
--------------------------------

- OS: Mac
- PyTorch version: master, v0.3.1, v0.3.0, v0.2.0, v0.1.12
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):
- Python version: N/A
- CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
- GPU models and configuration: N/A
- GCC version (if compiling from source): N/A

Version 0.3.1 below:
```
docker build --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=XXXX --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=XXXX --build-arg http_proxy=XXXX --build-arg https_proxy=XXXX -t test:XXXXX https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git#v0.3.1
```
This produces this:
```
WARNING: The following packages cannot be authenticated!
  libnccl2 libnccl-dev
E: There were unauthenticated packages and -y was used without --allow-unauthenticated
The command '/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends          build-essential          cmake          git          curl          vim          ca-certificates          libnccl2=2.0.5-2+cuda8.0          libnccl-dev=2.0.5-2+cuda8.0          libjpeg-dev          libpng-dev &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*' returned a non-zero code: 100
```
UPDATE:
Same goes for v0.3.0

UPDATE:
Running `v0.2.0` fails with below
```
 CMakeFiles/THC.dir/build.make:217: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorMode.cu.o' failed
    make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/THC.dir/THC_generated_THCTensorMode.cu.o] Error 1
    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
    CMakeFiles/Makefile2:67: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/THC.dir/all' failed
    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/THC.dir/all] Error 2
    Makefile:127: recipe for target 'all' failed
    make: *** [all] Error 2
    Running setup.py install for torch: finished with status 'error'
Cleaning up...
  Removing source in /tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build
Command "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/bin/python -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-k2bx1enk-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/
Exception information:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 215, in main
    status = self.run(options, args)
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/commands/install.py", line 342, in run
    prefix=options.prefix_path,
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/req/req_set.py", line 784, in install
    **kwargs
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 878, in install
    spinner=spinner,
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip/utils/__init__.py", line 707, in call_subprocess
    % (command_desc, proc.returncode, cwd))
pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/bin/python -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-k2bx1enk-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-nvl2npin-build/
Looking up "https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip/json" in the cache
No cache entry available
Starting new HTTPS connection (1): pypi.python.org
"GET /pypi/pip/json HTTP/1.1" 200 72983
Updating cache with response from "https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip/json"
Caching b/c date exists and max-age > 0
The command '/bin/sh -c TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST="3.5 5.2 6.0 6.1+PTX" TORCH_NVCC_FLAGS="-Xfatbin -compress-all"     CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../"     pip install -v .' returned a non-zero code: 1
```
UPDATE:
Running 0.1.12 gives this, similar to latest versions but different package:
```
WARNING: The following packages cannot be authenticated!
  libcudnn6 libcudnn6-dev
E: There were unauthenticated packages and -y was used without --allow-unauthenticated
The command '/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends          build-essential          cmake          git          curl          ca-certificates          libjpeg-dev          libpng-dev          libcudnn6=$CUDNN_VERSION-1+cuda8.0          libcudnn6-dev=$CUDNN_VERSION-1+cuda8.0 &&      rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*' returned a non-zero code: 100
```

Running `master` gives this:

Exception information:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 215, in main
    status = self.run(options, args)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/commands/install.py", line 342, in run
    prefix=options.prefix_path,
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/req/req_set.py", line 784, in install
    **kwargs
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pip/req/req_install.py", line 878, in install
    spinner=spinner,
